quote.text: I raise up my voice—not so I can shout, but so that those without a voice can be heard. We cannot succeed when half of us are held back.
quote.author: Malala Yousafzai

scripture.text: For I know the plans I have for you,” declares the Lord, “plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you a future and a hope.

message:
Hey Ms Sunshine ☀️💖

I hope you’ve had at least one moment today where you remembered how amazing you are... And if you haven’t yet, let me remind you.

Because I see you ...the way you pushing for your dreams, the way you rise even when it's hard, and the gentle power you bring into the world. You're not just beautiful on the outside ..you have a light that can’t be dimmed.

I admire you so deeply. I admire your strength, your resilience. And I believe in you more than words could ever say. I believe in every dream you've Put in your heart, every goal you’ve quietly held onto. They matter Because You matter.

You're not just someone I care about... you're someone I *cherish.* You mean the world to me, and I’m always going to be in your corner. Supporting you, cheering for you, and praying for you every step of the way.

So no matter how wild the storm gets, or how long the road feels..you're never walking it alone. Not when you have someone who got your back. 💛

Always here. Always believing in you.
